name: Forever Rural Integrated and Educational Needs Development Society(FRIENDS)

address: D.No:4-79,SANAMPUDI Post,SINGARAYAKONDA Mandal,PRAKASAM District,Andhra Pradesh,PIn Code;523101

briefDescription: This is FRIENDS CHILDREN HOME from singarayakonda organised by Forever Rural Integrated and Educational Needs Development Society (FRIENDS) Reg:No:116/2013., Our website:;www.friendsorg.hpage.in (All details displayed in our website)we have been doing run an Orphanage for HIV effected ,Orphan and poor children since three years.This home is running with some local contributions and our own funds.We got licence from Government of Andhra Pradesh to run this Home.(Licence No:0856/1969/2013).We have also 12AA and 80G certificates. We need support from your side to sustainable this home.We take a strong decision to take care of this HIV effected children forever.If you are interesting to support ? Please you must do inquiry  and then take decision.
